meta.name: description
meta.content: Oak Grove School District serves TK-8th grade students and is located in San Jose, CA.

li.a: School Single Plan for Student Achievement (SPSA)
Flexible Learning Options for School Closure

header.h2: School Closure and OGSD Meal Distribution Sites

div.p:
Per the decision made by Santa Clara County Office of Education and the 32 school districts in the county, all schools are to be physically closed for the remainder of the school year and begin a transition to distance learning for the remainder of the school calendar year. We will continue to offer students Flexible Learning Options and resources as we continue to support families. Free breakfast and lunch will continue to be served to children ages 0-18 Monday through Friday. Children DO NOT need to be present in order to receive meals.
• Breakfast and Lunch Meal Service
• Monday – Friday
• 10:30 – 11:30 am (Anderson, Christopher, Edenvale, Hayes, Stipe, Davis)

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1850px; height: 550px;

svg.metadata: Created by potrace 1.10, written by Peter Selinger 2001-2011

div.div: Location: District Office - 6578 Santa Teresa Blvd., San Jose

li.div: Oak Grove schools provide a positive, predictable, consistent and safe learning environment.
Students collaborate in rigorous and relevant Common Core lessons.
Classrooms are enhanced with 21st Century Technology: Chromebooks and Google Apps.
Regular attendance and punctuality are important to the students' academic success.
Family engagement promotes children's learning and healthy development in Oak Grove.
Parents and guardians are provided opportunities to School Choice and Programs.

table.style: width: 177px; table-layout: fixed; height: 58px; background-color: white; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto

div.h3:
Congratulations! Bernal Intermediate and Herman Intermediate/AdVENTURE STEM for receiving the 2019 CALIFORNIA DISTINGUISHED SCHOOL AWARD.
Oak Grove students advance in English and Math according to the California Assessment of Student Performance and Progress (CAASPP).

em.strong: "To ensure every child's potential is achieved"

div.h3:
Respect, Integrity, Inclusivity, Positive Interdependence,
Student Learning, Quality Performance

h1.a: School Closure and OGSD Meal Distribution Sites

div.div: Per the decision made by Santa Clara County Office of Education and the 32 school districts in the county, all schools are to be physically closed for the remainder of the school year and begin a transition to distance learning for the remainder of the school calendar year. We will continue to offer students Flexible Learning Options and resources as we continue to support families. Free breakfast and lunch will continue to be served to children ages 0-18 Monday through Friday. Children DO NOT need to be present in order to receive meals. • Breakfast and Lunch Meal Service • Monday – Friday • 10:30 – 11:30 am (Anderson, Christopher, Edenvale, Hayes, Stipe, Davis)
Oak Grove School District would like your feedback on the 2020-21 LCAP (Local Control Accountability Plan), please take our LCAP Survey.

Oak Grove School District is excited to offer additional Student Flexible Distance Learning Options. Our district team has developed new online and printed flexible learning options (FLOs) by grade level to support students and families with the goal of limiting the regression of skills.
Online learning options can be accessed at our new OGSD flexible learning options website. New online learning options will be uploaded to this website again on 4/17 and 4/24 by 5pm for the following week. Students will continue to have access to all apps connected to their Clever accounts.

div.span: 6578 Santa Teresa Blvd, San Jose, CA 95119
